ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We thank Dr. Bo Li, Dr. Feng‐Sheng Hu, Dr. Barbara Hug, Dr. Jennifer Fraterrigo, Dr. Guillaume de Lafontaine, and Joseph Napier for their insights and assistance conceiving and revising the research presented. This material is based upon work supported by the NASA Earth and Space Science Fellowship under Grant No. NNX15AN09H and the National Science Foundation under Grant No. 1418339. The authors would like to acknowledge the support of Research & Innovation and the Office of Information Technology at the University of Nevada, Reno, for computing resources on the Pronghorn High‐Performance Computing Cluster. The authors would also like to thank the CyberGIS lab at University of Illinois for access to use the ROGER supercomputer, which was supported by NSF under grant number: 1429699. From the CyberGIS lab, we would like to thank Dr. Anand Padmanabhan, Dr. Yan Liu, and Jonathan Rush for their assistance with TauDEM and other general training in geospatial supercomputing applications, which was made possible through the CyberGIS Center Help Desk.
